content: so many of you have enjoyed making my little all-in-one baby top - month by month it is my most popular baby design this is a matching baby beanie hat requires~ dk yarn light worsted 8ply 4mm needles sizes ~ early / small baby newborn baby 6 months 9 - 12 months baby worked flat and seamed - this if so easy to knit and so sweet **to get this free pattern please click on the https link just below ↓**
